post:
* approved by @Ishaq



We have server hardware for sale currently located in Chicago that is perfect for hosting. Here is a general list of available equipment:



- 11x 1U HP or Dell servers ( hard drives not included, rails included )
- 3x 2U Dell servers ( hard drives not included, rails included )
- 1x HP gigabit switch
- 1x Tripp-Lite PDU
- 1x Lantronix Spider KVM
- 26x HDDS and SSDs



If interested, please PM me and I can provide a full inventory list and price breakdown for each item. Again, we need to sell these as fast as possible so we are willing to negotiate on price. I would prefer to sell all the items in 1 bulk purchase.



All equipment is located in Chicago. Buyer can arrange shipping or continue colocation at its current datacenter. This hardware was pulled from a working environment and previously used for dedicated server hosting.



If you have any questions, I'd be happy to answer them!
